Grammar

Examples

      Semantics 

          Arithmetic {
Exp
  = AddExp

AddExp
  = AddExp "+" MulExp  -- plus
  | AddExp "-" MulExp  -- minus
  | MulExp

MulExp
  = MulExp "*" ExpExp  -- times
  | MulExp "/" ExpExp  -- divide
  | ExpExp

ExpExp
  = PriExp "^" ExpExp  -- power
  | PriExp

PriExp
  = "(" Exp ")"  -- paren
  | "+" PriExp   -- pos
  | "-" PriExp   -- neg
  | ident
  | number

ident  (an identifier)
  = letter alnum*

number  (a number)
  = digit* "." digit+  -- fract
  | digit+             -- whole
}
                
          2 * (42 - 1) / 9
          
      
          1+2*3
